duties_responsibilities.duty: Promoting sales, responding to customer inquiries, and placing special orders within assigned department.
Practicing safe food handling procedures and maintaining a clean work area.
Receiving, inspecting, and stocking products; rotating and merchandising product to maintain freshness and appeal.
Operating the checkstand, memorizing PLU codes, and performing Point-Of-Sale (POS) and inventory activities.
Receiving, inspecting, and stocking products; maintaining floral area; keeping areas and equipment clean within the produce department.
Receiving, inspecting, and stocking products; labeling products for display; providing customer service at the seafood counter; keeping areas and equipment clean within the meat/seafood department.
Receiving, inspecting, and stocking products; preparing, labeling, and packaging products for display; taking special orders; keeping areas and equipment clean within the bakery/deli department.
Maintaining cleanliness and sanitation throughout the store; operating janitorial equipment; emptying trash; performing other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma (or G.E.D.) or additional job experience
